QuestData.Title: Even Gronn Have Standards
QuestData.Description: Are you familiar with Shattrath City, $c? Above it to the northwest is a place called the Barrier Hills, which you can only get to upon a flying mount.$B$BOne of Gruul's sons, Slaag, exiled himself and took control of the Gordunni ogres that reside there. Even at such a distance, we cannot afford to leave him in peace, lest he return when the rest of his brothers have been slain.$B$B$n, you must travel there, and bring back his standard as proof that he has been dealt with.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you return with Slaag's standard in hand?
QuestData.RewardText: What a relief that Slaag is gone. No longer will we be threatened by the looming specter of his return!$B$BIf you do not mind, I will take the standard as a symbol of hope for all of the ogres of the mountains.$B$BThank you, $n.
